div.div: Update Regarding Budget Vote / Trustee Election

img.title: Board Room at District Office
img.p: Due to Executive Order No 202.13, the School Board and Budget Election which was previously scheduled for May 19, 2020 is postponed. As soon as we receive more information from the Governor’s Office we will update the community.
